Locket of Lingering Sorrows.description: This locket seems to hold the very essence of sadness. It is rumored to contain the last tear shed by Lady Eleanor before her tragic demise within these walls. Holding it might reveal forgotten memories, or perhaps amplify one's own deepest regrets.
Locket of Lingering Sorrows.name: Locket of Lingering Sorrows

Clockwork Nightingale.appearanceDescription: A small, exquisitely carved wooden bird, its wings outstretched as if in mid-flight. It is made from a dark, unfamiliar wood and feels surprisingly weighty for its size. Tiny, almost imperceptible gears are visible beneath its carved feathers.

container.howToOpen: The glass door of the grandfather clock can be opened by gently pulling on the ornate brass handle.
container.howToStoreItem: Items can be placed inside the grandfather clock by opening its glass door and carefully setting them within the main cavity.

Clockwork Nightingale.description: This automaton bird appears to be a marvel of craftsmanship from a bygone era. When wound, it is said to sing a lullaby so beautiful it can bring peace to even the most tormented soul, though its mechanism appears long dormant, frozen alongside the clock.
Clockwork Nightingale.name: Clockwork Nightingale

Chronometer's Finger.appearanceDescription: A single, skeletal finger bone, polished smooth as glass. It is unnaturally long and thin, and a faint, chilling mist seems to perpetually cling to its surface.

container.howToOpen: The glass door of the grandfather clock can be opened by gently pulling on the ornate brass handle.
container.howToStoreItem: Items can be placed inside the grandfather clock by opening its glass door and carefully setting them within the main cavity.

Chronometer's Finger.description: This bone radiates an aura of temporal displacement. Legends whisper that it belonged to a chronomancer who attempted to unravel the mysteries of time itself within Blackwood Manor, only to be consumed by his own ambition. Touching it might cause brief, disorienting glimpses of the past or future.
Chronometer's Finger.name: Chronometer's Finger

Vial of a Frozen Tear.appearanceDescription: A single, dried tear, preserved within a miniature glass vial. It shimmers faintly with an inner light, and a wisp of ethereal mist curls around its stopper.

container.howToOpen: The locket opens with a gentle click when pressed on its side.
container.howToStoreItem: Items can be placed inside the locket by carefully opening it and placing them within its velvet-lined interior.

Vial of a Frozen Tear.description: This vial contains what appears to be a solidified tear, radiating a faint aura of sorrow. Legend says that tears shed in true despair can sometimes retain a fragment of the emotion that created them.
Vial of a Frozen Tear.name: Vial of a Frozen Tear

Ribbon of Whispers.appearanceDescription: A faded, silk ribbon, once a vibrant emerald green, now bleached to a pale, ghostly hue. A single, perfectly preserved dewdrop, impossibly still, clings to its frayed end.

container.howToOpen: The locket opens with a gentle click when pressed on its side.
container.howToStoreItem: Items can be placed inside the locket by carefully opening it and placing them within its velvet-lined interior.

Ribbon of Whispers.description: This ribbon carries the faint scent of honeysuckle and the lingering whisper of forgotten laughter. It is said to have been a token of affection, lost during a time of great upheaval within the manor.
Ribbon of Whispers.name: Ribbon of Whispers

Key to Forgotten Sorrows.appearanceDescription: A miniature, tarnished silver key, no larger than a thumbnail. Its teeth are intricately carved into the shape of tiny, weeping willow leaves.

container.howToOpen: The locket opens with a gentle click when pressed on its side.
container.howToStoreItem: Items can be placed inside the locket by carefully opening it and placing them within its velvet-lined interior.

Key to Forgotten Sorrows.description: This tiny key feels impossibly heavy for its size, as if burdened by the secrets it guards. It is rumored to unlock not a physical door, but a hidden passage within the heart, or perhaps a forgotten memory.
Key to Forgotten Sorrows.name: Key to Forgotten Sorrows

Rose-Kissed Golden Key.appearanceDescription: A single, withered black rose is now entwined with a gleaming golden key. The dark petals of the rose seem to absorb some of the key's unnatural luminescence, creating a strange, pulsing glow where they meet. The key itself appears unchanged, its low hum slightly more pronounced.
Rose-Kissed Golden Key.description: This object is a poignant, yet potent, symbol. The union of the withered rose and the resonant key suggests a profound connection between loss and unlocking hidden potential. It hums with a gentle energy, hinting at secrets waiting to be revealed, perhaps related to matters of the heart or forgotten passages.
Rose-Kissed Golden Key.name: Rose-Kissed Golden Key

Willow's Heart Locket.appearanceDescription: The tarnished silver locket now cradles a withered black rose entwined with a golden key. The rose's dark petals absorb some of the key's luminescence, creating a strange, pulsing glow where they meet. The weeping willow engraving on the locket seems to weep tears of faint light.

container.howToOpen: The locket can be opened by gently prying its two halves apart.
container.howToStoreItem: A small item can be carefully placed within the locket's hollow interior.

Willow's Heart Locket.description: This locket, once a symbol of sorrow, is now transformed. The rose-kissed golden key, when placed within its embrace, has awakened a dormant power. It hums with a gentle energy, a poignant fusion of loss and unlocking potential, hinting at secrets tied to matters of the heart or forgotten passages within the manor. The weeping willow engraving appears to weep tears of faint light.
Willow's Heart Locket.name: Willow's Heart Locket

The Tome of Whispers.appearanceDescription: A thick, leather-bound tome rests open on the desk, its pages filled with dense, handwritten script and intricate diagrams. A faint, pulsating light emanates from its core, casting strange shadows.

container.howToOpen: The book is already open, its secrets waiting to be deciphered.
container.howToStoreItem: There is no way to close this book, but one might place a smaller object within its pages.

The Tome of Whispers.description: This ancient grimoire pulses with an unnatural energy, its arcane symbols seeming to shift and reform before your eyes. It speaks of forgotten rituals and the manipulation of unseen forces, hinting at knowledge both profound and perilous.
The Tome of Whispers.name: The Tome of Whispers

Serpent Letter Opener.appearanceDescription: A tarnished silver letter opener lies on the desk, its handle intricately carved with a serpent devouring its own tail. A faint warmth emanates from it.
Serpent Letter Opener.description: This elegant, yet ominous, letter opener feels strangely heavy in the hand. It is said to have been used by the master of the house for more than just correspondence.
Serpent Letter Opener.name: Serpent Letter Opener

Rose of Sorrow.appearanceDescription: A single, withered black rose sits in a delicate crystal vase on a nearby table. Its petals are brittle and sharp, and it seems to absorb the faint light in the room.
Rose of Sorrow.description: This is no ordinary rose; it is a bloom of sorrow, its beauty irrevocably intertwined with the grief that permeates Blackwood Manor. It emanates a profound sense of loss.
Rose of Sorrow.name: Rose of Sorrow

Silent Grandfather Clock.appearanceDescription: A large, ornate grandfather clock stands against one wall, its pendulum still and its face cracked. Strange, spectral hands appear to be faintly etched onto its glass.
Silent Grandfather Clock.description: The grandfather clock has long since ceased to mark the passage of time, yet it seems to hold a memory of every second that has passed within these walls. Its silence is deafening.
Silent Grandfather Clock.name: Silent Grandfather Clock

pickupable.reasonWhyNotPickup: The clock is far too heavy and deeply rooted to the floor to be moved.

A grand, yet decaying, staircase leads down to the foyer.
A heavy oak door, slightly ajar, leads into a study.
A narrow, almost hidden doorway is concealed behind a tattered tapestry.

Foyer.description: The grand staircase ascends to the upper hallway.

turns.description: Elias Thorne drifts towards the Rose of Sorrow, a bloom whose petals are the color of a bruised twilight. As his spectral form draws near, the flower emanates a profound wave of sorrow, a palpable ache that resonates with the lingering grief of Blackwood Manor. The air around it grows heavy, thick with the unspoken lament of a thousand lost moments, and Elias feels a phantom chill trace the edges of his ethereal being, a reminder of the sorrow that anchors him to this place.
